Docs.param: Number of worker/data nodes in the cluster. Suggestion value: 4. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

The allowed idle time for the on-demand HDInsight cluster. Specifies how long the on-demand HDInsight cluster stays alive after completion of an activity run if there are no other active jobs in the cluster. The minimum value is 5 mins. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
Version of the HDInsight cluster. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
Azure Storage linked service to be used by the on-demand cluster for storing and processing data.
The customer’s subscription to host the cluster. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
The Tenant id/name to which the service principal belongs. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
The resource group where the cluster belongs. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdditionalLinkedServiceNames As IList(Of LinkedServiceReference)

Docs.summary: Specifies additional storage accounts for the HDInsight linked service so that the Data Factory service can register them on your behalf.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.ClusterNamePrefix : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: The prefix of cluster name, postfix will be distinct with timestamp. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

The password to access the cluster. Please note is the base class. According to the scenario, a derived class of the base class might need to be assigned here, or this property needs to be casted to one of the possible derived classes. The available derived classes include and .

Docs.summary: Number of worker/data nodes in the cluster. Suggestion value: 4. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

The password to SSH remotely connect cluster’s node (for Linux). Please note is the base class. According to the scenario, a derived class of the base class might need to be assigned here, or this property needs to be casted to one of the possible derived classes. The available derived classes include and .

Docs.summary: The username to SSH remotely connect to cluster’s node (for Linux). Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

Docs.summary: The cluster type. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: member this.ClusterUserName : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: The username to access the cluster. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: member this.CoreConfiguration : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: Specifies the core configuration parameters (as in core-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster to be created.
The credential reference containing authentication information.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DataNodeSize : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: Specifies the size of the data node for the HDInsight cluster.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.EncryptedCredential : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: member this.HBaseConfiguration : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: Specifies the HBase configuration parameters (hbase-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
The name of Azure SQL linked service that point to the HCatalog database. The on-demand HDInsight cluster is created by using the Azure SQL database as the metastore.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.HdfsConfiguration : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: Specifies the HDFS configuration parameters (hdfs-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

Docs.summary: Specifies the size of the head node for the HDInsight cluster.

Docs.summary: Specifies the hive configuration parameters (hive-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

The key for the service principal id. Please note is the base class. According to the scenario, a derived class of the base class might need to be assigned here, or this property needs to be casted to one of the possible derived classes. The available derived classes include and .

MemberSignature.Value: member this.SparkVersion : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: The version of spark if the cluster type is 'spark'. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

Docs.summary: The ARM resource ID for the subnet in the vNet. If virtualNetworkId was specified, then this property is required. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

Docs.summary: The allowed idle time for the on-demand HDInsight cluster. Specifies how long the on-demand HDInsight cluster stays alive after completion of an activity run if there are no other active jobs in the cluster. The minimum value is 5 mins. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Version : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: Version of the HDInsight cluster. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: member this.VirtualNetworkId : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: The ARM resource ID for the vNet to which the cluster should be joined after creation. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: member this.YarnConfiguration : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: Specifies the Yarn configuration parameters (yarn-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
